component.text: Compatibilidad con rutas estáticas en un switch Catalyst 2960
Habilitación de la funcionalidad de routing IPv4 en un switch Catalyst 2960
Router que participa en routing con un switch
Configuración de una ruta estática en un switch Catalyst 2960
Tabla de routing final en el router

component.feedback: ***Debe introducir el comando exacto y completo. Los comandos que incluyen un nombre o una contraseña distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas.***
component.existingcommands: Muestre la plantilla de Switch Database Manager (SDM) actual.

command.deviceresponse:
The current template is "default" template.
The selected template optimizes the resources in
the switch to support this level of features for
0 routed interfaces and 255 VLANs.

number of unicast mac addresses: 8K
number of IPv4 IGMP groups: 0.25K
number of IPv4/MAC qos aces: 0.125k
number of IPv4/MAC security aces: 0.375k
command.instruction: Ingrese al modo de configuración y muestre las opciones para el comando “sdm prefer”.

command.deviceresponse: <font face='Courier New' size="10" class="font10px">Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with CNTL/Z.</font>

default Default bias
dual-ipv4-and-ipv6 Support both IPv4 and IPv6
lanbase-routing Supports both IPv4 and IPv6 Static Routing
qos QoS bias
command.instruction: Configure el switch para admitir el routing.

command.deviceresponse:
Changes to the running SDM preferences have been stored, but cannot take effect
until the next reload.
Use 'show sdm prefer' to see what SDM preference is currently active.
command.instruction: Recargue el switch con la opción “do” y guarde la configuración cuando se le solicite.

command.prompt: System configuration has been modified. Save? [yes/no]:
command.deviceresponse:
Building configuration...
[OK]
Proceed with reload? [confirm]
*Mar 20 00:10:24.557: %SYS-5-RELOAD: Reload requested by console. Reload Reason: Reload
.
command.instruction: Ahora, el switch está nuevamente en el modo EXEC del usuario. Pase al modo EXEC privilegiado y muestre la plantilla de SDM actual.

command.deviceresponse:
The current template is "lanbase-routing" template.
The selected template optimizes the resources in
the switch to support this level of features for
0 routed interfaces and 255 VLANs.

number of unicast mac addresses: 4K
number of IPv4 IGMP groups + multicast routes: 0.25K
number of IPv4 unicast routes: 0.75K
number of directly-connected IPv4 hosts: 0.75K
number of indirect IPv4 routes: 16
number of IPv6 multicast groups: 0.375k
number of directly-connected IPv6 addresses: 0.75K
number of indirect IPv6 unicast routes: 16
number of IPv4 policy based routing aces: 0
number of IPv4/MAC qos aces: 0.125k
number of IPv4/MAC security aces: 0.375k
number of IPv6 policy based routing aces: 0
number of IPv6 qos aces: 0.375k
number of IPv6 security aces: 127
S1#
command.instruction:
Complete los siguientes pasos en orden:
  • Ingresar al modo de configuración.
  • Habilitar el routing.
  • Configurar una ruta predeterminada utilizando 192.168.1.10 como dirección de siguiente salto.
  • Utilizar el comando “do” para mostrar la tabla actual de routing en el switch.

command.deviceresponse: <font face='Courier New' size="10" class="font10px">Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with CNTL/Z.</font>

Codes: L - local, C - connected, S - static, R - RIP, M - mobile, B - BGP
D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external, O - OSPF, IA - OSPF inter area
N1 - OSPF NSSA external type 1, N2 - OSPF NSSA external type 2
E1 - OSPF external type 1, E2 - OSPF external type 2
i - IS-IS, su - IS-IS summary, L1 - IS-IS level-1, L2 - IS-IS level-2
ia - IS-IS inter area, * - candidate default, U - per-user static route
o - ODR, P - periodic downloaded static route, H - NHRP, l - LISP
+ - replicated route, % - next hop override

Gateway of last resort is 192.168.1.10 to network 0.0.0.0

S* 0.0.0.0/0 [1/0] via 192.168.1.10
192.168.1.0/24 is variably subnetted, 2 subnets, 2 masks
C 192.168.1.0/24 is directly connected, Vlan1
L 192.168.1.1/32 is directly connected, Vlan1
192.168.2.0/24 is variably subnetted, 2 subnets, 2 masks
C 192.168.2.0/24 is directly connected, Vlan2
L 192.168.2.1/32 is directly connected, Vlan2
command.instruction: <font size='10' face="Arial" class="syntaxBottomLine"><b>Configuró correctamente las rutas estáticas en un switch Catalyst 2960.</font>
